title: How to Keep Your Emotions in Check
itunes:author: Guest: Deborah Pegues
itunes:summary:
Deborah Pegues offers the tools you need to keep those emotions in check so that your relationships can remain healthy. From keeping God in the mix to managing your schedule and stress level to dealing with demanding people, you’ll learn how to keep your emotions in check and abide in God’s peace.


Receive the book "30 Days to Taming Your Emotions" and the audio download of the broadcast "How to Keep Your Emotions in Check" for your donation of any amount! Plus, receive member-exclusive benefits when you make a recurring gift today. Your monthly support helps families thrive: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-09-12?refcd=1467101


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/how-to-keep-your-emotions-in-check/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
